channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Content Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Content Manager

item.title: CVE-2018-1502|2024-08-05T03:59:39.206Z -- ibm -- content%20manager
item.description: IBM Content Manager Enterprise Edition Resource Manager 8.4.3 and 9.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 141338.
